title: Design Tacit Knowledge Exploration and Digital Simulation-Based Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic design processes and experience using design software
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining studio-based learning with digital simulation tools

learning_goals: Cultivation of the ability to analyze and document tacit knowledge in design practice through digital simulation
Acquisition of the ability to utilize video ethnography and real-time simulation technologies for user experience observation
Development of the ability to conceptualize non-verbal design elements (spatial perception, emotional responses) through project-based collaboration

resources: Digital Simulation Software License (Including VR/AR Tools)
Multimedia Recording Equipment (High-Performance Camera, 360-Degree Capture Device)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
